Summary: strange circle object in orange color wich was moving very fast
trends: There have been no other sightings in Vir
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn 16.august about 23:30 hours i was watering the garden and this object catch my attention.The object was round and orange in color.I must say that night was very clear and the sky was full of stars.This object just appear in a moment about 5km high.All the time object was changing directions with great speed left and right and in some moment it was just hoovering in place.The shape was like the big fireball with the red illuminations from bottom of the object.I manage to grab my camera and take one photo then run to house and grab my video camera.(the movie that i recorded last for about 30 sec. when i return from vacation i will send you the clip).On the clip it is clearly visible how the object move left and right with the great speed and in one moment it just run straight to the sky and didn't been visible for about three seconds.It just disappear among the stars.After three second it came down again and with the great speed cross the sky in the direction of island Pag. im sending you the photo of object i will like to know what is it.It was not a plane or helicopter because it moved with impossible speed and changing direction in the same time.
